frontmatter.title: SEO Optimization with React.js
frontmatter.author: Rho Lall
frontmatter.short: Google actually publishes a handy search engine optimization or SEO starter guide through the google search central. We're going to go through this and go over the various pieces of how a site should be built and optimized. In terms of SEO There are three big areas of focus. I'll focus on all three parts of this SEO triangle.
